craft_bugs.title: Excel Ribbon Button Alignment Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: The "Save" button in the ribbon appears slightly misaligned compared to other buttons. Visual inconsistency creates a jarring experience.

craft_bugs.title: Copilot Dialog Animation Stutter
craft_bugs.description: When dismissing the Copilot dialog, the animation stutters and doesn't feel smooth. Breaks the polished user experience.

craft_bugs.title: Cell Selection Color Mismatch
craft_bugs.description: Selected cell color doesn't match the design system color palette. Uses #0078d4 instead of the correct #106ebe.

craft_bugs.title: Save Dialog Typography Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Font size in save dialog is 16px instead of the standard 14px. Breaks typography hierarchy.

craft_bugs.title: Tooltip Shadow Elevation Wrong
craft_bugs.description: Tooltip uses L2 shadow instead of L3 shadow. Incorrect surface elevation creates visual confusion.

craft_bugs.title: Icon Spacing Inconsistent in Format Panel
craft_bugs.description: Icons in format panel have inconsistent spacing - some are 8px apart, others are 12px. Visual rhythm is broken.

craft_bugs.title: Dropdown Border Radius Mismatch
craft_bugs.description: Chart type dropdown uses 8px border radius instead of standard 4px. Inconsistent with design system.

craft_bugs.title: Loading State Animation Too Fast
craft_bugs.description: Loading spinner animation is 200ms instead of standard 400ms. Feels rushed and unpolished.

craft_bugs.title: Button Hover State Color Wrong
craft_bugs.description: Primary button hover state uses #106ebe instead of correct #005a9e. Color transition feels off.

craft_bugs.title: Panel Padding Inconsistent
craft_bugs.description: Format panel uses 20px padding while other panels use 16px. Inconsistent spacing creates visual disharmony.

craft_bugs.title: Excel Ribbon Tab Spacing Inconsistent
craft_bugs.description: Spacing between ribbon tabs varies - some are 8px apart, others are 12px. Breaks visual rhythm and feels unpolished.

craft_bugs.title: Cell Border Color Wrong on Selection
craft_bugs.description: Selected cell border uses #0078d4 instead of correct #106ebe. Color mismatch creates visual confusion.

craft_bugs.title: Format Panel Typography Hierarchy Broken
craft_bugs.description: Section headers in format panel use 16px instead of 14px. Breaks typography hierarchy and feels inconsistent.

craft_bugs.title: Excel Ribbon Button Alignment Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Ribbon buttons are not perfectly aligned - some are 1-2px off from the grid. This creates visual noise and feels unpolished.

craft_bugs.title: Dialog Shadow Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Dialog shadow uses 0 4px 8px instead of the standard 0 2px 4px. This creates inconsistent elevation perception.

craft_bugs.title: Icon Size Mismatch in Toolbar
craft_bugs.description: Icons in the toolbar have inconsistent sizes - some are 16px, others are 20px. This breaks visual harmony.

craft_bugs.title: Border Radius Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Some buttons use 4px border radius while others use 2px. This creates visual inconsistency across the interface.

craft_bugs.title: Grid Line Color Mismatch
craft_bugs.description: Grid lines use #e1dfdd instead of the correct #edebe9. This creates subtle but noticeable color inconsistency.

craft_bugs.title: Panel Header Alignment Issue
craft_bugs.description: Panel headers are not perfectly aligned with their content - 1px offset creates visual noise.

craft_bugs.title: Text Baseline Misalignment
craft_bugs.description: Text elements have inconsistent baseline alignment - some are 1px higher than others.

craft_bugs.title: Background Color Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Some panels use #ffffff while others use #faf9f8. This creates subtle background inconsistency.

craft_bugs.title: Copilot Dialog Animation Stutter
craft_bugs.description: When Copilot dialog appears, there is a slight stutter in the animation. The transition is not smooth and feels jarring.

craft_bugs.title: Slow Cell Selection Response
craft_bugs.description: Cell selection takes 600ms instead of the target 400ms. This exceeds Doherty Threshold and feels sluggish.

craft_bugs.title: Ribbon Animation Frame Drop
craft_bugs.description: Ribbon animations drop frames during transitions, creating choppy visual experience.

craft_bugs.title: Dialog Opening Delay
craft_bugs.description: Dialog opening takes 800ms instead of 400ms. This creates noticeable lag in user interactions.

craft_bugs.title: Scroll Performance Issue
craft_bugs.description: Scrolling through large datasets causes frame drops and stuttering animation.

craft_bugs.title: Button Click Response Lag
craft_bugs.description: Button clicks have 500ms response time instead of 400ms, exceeding Doherty Threshold.

craft_bugs.title: Cell Selection Color Mismatch
craft_bugs.description: Selected cell border color uses #0078d4 instead of the correct #106ebe. This creates a color inconsistency in the design system.

craft_bugs.title: Button Color System Violation
craft_bugs.description: Secondary button uses #323130 instead of the correct #605e5c from the design system.

craft_bugs.title: Typography Scale Violation
craft_bugs.description: Panel headers use 18px instead of the correct 16px from the typography scale.

craft_bugs.title: Spacing Token Violation
craft_bugs.description: Dialog padding uses 20px instead of the correct 24px spacing token.

craft_bugs.title: Icon Color System Violation
craft_bugs.description: Icons use #323130 instead of the correct #605e5c from the icon color system.

craft_bugs.title: Border Color Violation
craft_bugs.description: Input borders use #d2d0ce instead of the correct #e1dfdd from the border color system.

craft_bugs.title: Save Button Typography Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Save button text uses 14px font size instead of the standard 12px. This breaks typography hierarchy and feels inconsistent.

craft_bugs.title: Panel Header Font Weight Issue
craft_bugs.description: Panel headers use 500 weight instead of the correct 600 weight, breaking typography hierarchy.

craft_bugs.title: Tooltip Font Size Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Tooltip text uses 12px instead of the correct 10px, making it too prominent.

craft_bugs.title: Menu Item Typography Mismatch
craft_bugs.description: Menu items use 14px instead of 12px, creating inconsistent text hierarchy.

craft_bugs.title: Label Font Weight Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Form labels use 400 weight instead of 500, making them less prominent than intended.

craft_bugs.title: Format Panel Surface Level Violation
craft_bugs.description: Format panel uses L1 elevation (0px) instead of L2 (4px). This breaks the surface hierarchy and makes it feel flat.

craft_bugs.title: Dropdown Surface Elevation Issue
craft_bugs.description: Dropdown menu uses L2 elevation instead of L3, breaking surface hierarchy.

craft_bugs.title: Tooltip Shadow Violation
craft_bugs.description: Tooltip uses 0 2px 4px shadow instead of 0 4px 8px, breaking L3 surface specification.

craft_bugs.title: Dialog Surface Level Mismatch
craft_bugs.description: Dialog uses L3 elevation instead of L2, creating incorrect surface hierarchy.

craft_bugs.title: Ribbon Tab Spacing Inconsistent
craft_bugs.description: Spacing between ribbon tabs varies - some are 8px apart, others are 12px. This breaks visual rhythm and feels unpolished.

craft_bugs.title: Dropdown Menu Spacing Inconsistency
craft_bugs.description: Dropdown menu items have inconsistent spacing - some are 8px apart, others are 12px. This breaks visual rhythm.

craft_bugs.title: Panel Content Spacing Issue
craft_bugs.description: Panel content has inconsistent padding - some sections use 16px, others use 20px.

craft_bugs.title: Button Group Spacing Violation
craft_bugs.description: Button groups have inconsistent spacing between buttons - some are 4px, others are 8px.

craft_bugs.title: Tooltip Animation Timing Issue
craft_bugs.description: Tooltip appears too quickly (100ms) instead of the standard 300ms delay. This feels jarring and interrupts user flow.

craft_bugs.title: Button Hover Animation Speed
craft_bugs.description: Button hover animation is too fast (150ms) instead of the standard 200ms, feeling abrupt.

craft_bugs.title: Dialog Transition Timing
craft_bugs.description: Dialog transition takes 500ms instead of the standard 300ms, feeling sluggish.

craft_bugs.title: Button Hover State Interaction Issue
craft_bugs.description: Button hover state color transition is too abrupt - no smooth transition between normal and hover states.

craft_bugs.title: Focus State Visual Feedback
craft_bugs.description: Focus states lack proper visual feedback - users cannot clearly see which element is focused.

craft_bugs.title: Disabled State Clarity
craft_bugs.description: Disabled button states are not clearly distinguishable from enabled states.

craft_bugs.title: Multi-Surface Consistency Violation
craft_bugs.description: Similar elements across L1/L2/L3 surfaces have inconsistent styling - buttons look different in ribbon vs panels vs dropdowns.
